ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hi
ygData.msgSnippet: and if that still doesn t get you there, send an ooc: can someone please show me the way to the POK book? Wes
ygData.messageBody:
and if that still doesn't get you there, send an ooc: can someone please show me the way to the POK book?

"Wes <aihacker@...>" <aihacker@...> wrote:

The pop is a book on a stand just outside the iskar starting town.

Walk down the path to the newbie ramp, when the grass turns to dirt,
follow the dirt line to the right until you get to the edge of the
mountain. You should see the book.


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "longdstud <longdstud@y...>"
<longdstud@y...> wrote:
> My name is Rox i'm a Iksar monk I have been looking for pop does
> anyone know where it is I have looked in all of the freeports even
> the one in kunark and I can't find it does it connect to the
dreaded
> plains?
>
> Rox datcradle
